patthana20.4:1.1_0: Nasaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:2.1_0: Naganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:3.1_0: Naoghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:4.1_0: Nayogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:5.1_0: Nanīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.4:6.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.4:7.1_0: Naparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.4:8.1_0: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
